name: Android Keyboard – Material 3 UI Kit
description:
👋 Hey,


The Doist design team needed an Android Material 3 style keyboard for their design library, so we created one and decided to share it with the community. Enjoy! ✌️


Changelog

25.04.2022 V1


Android Keyboard UI kit release

  • 3 Keyboard component (Default, Todoist, Twist themes)
  • 3 Variants (lower-case, upper-case, numerals)
  • Color styles
  • Icons
  • Key components
  • Toolbar component


__


Made by the Doist design team. Inspired by Google Android 12, Material 3 guidelines.  Some theme variants are based on Todoist and Twist. This keyboard design is using Roboto.
